casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Toney CAUDLE. No. 433P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 17, 2006. Robert C. Montgomery, Jane Ammons Gilchrist, Assistant Attorney Generals, William Graham, District Attorney, for State of NC. Kevin Patrick Bradley, Durham, for Toney Caudle.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th day of September 2005 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of October 2005."
